pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simplex Visualization of Cell Fate Similarity in Single-Cell Data // Create simplex plots to visualize the similarity between single-cells and selected clusters in a 1-/2-/3-simplex space. Velocity information can be added as an additional layer. See Liu J, Wang Y et al (2023) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btaf119 for more details.
